abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column praises world leaders for achieving promising consensus at Paris climate talks, and chastises Republicans for ongoing opposition; argues setting global price on carbon will seal transition from fossil fuels to renewable energy and fulfill promise of Paris agreement.
lead_paragraph: The agreement means we have a chance to avoid unmanageable effects of global warming and to handle the effects we can’t avoid.

headline.main: Paris Climate Accord Is a Big, Big Deal
headline.print_headline: Paris Is a Big, Big Deal

snippet: The agreement means we have a chance to avoid unmanageable effects of global warming and to handle the effects we can’t avoid.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject
